1: Ni Ala tɔgɔ ye, hinɛ labɔlen tigi, hinɛ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnlen tigi
2: Tanu bɛ Ala ye, danfɛnw tigi,
3: hinɛ labɔlen tigi, hinɛ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnlen tigi
5: I jaati an b'o de bato, wa i jaati an bɛ dɛmɛ ɲini o de fɛ
7: maaw ka sira ko do, i nɛɛmara maa minuw kan, funu kɛra maa minuw kɔrɔ ani maa fililenw, olu ka sira ko tɛ
